body:
List some money-saving/cheap techniques that you use! Don't be afraid, you might learn something!
  • Making my 1st computer with a case I found on the sidewalk.
  • Shopping at Ross. (Often)
  • Taking 2 thrown out bookshelfs as my own.
  • Refilling Chili Flakes at home with packets from Pizza Hut. (Once)
  • Refilling ketchup at home with packets from a burger restaurant. (Once)
Have fun!

title: How Cheap Are You?

replies.body:
Mine are
  • Eating Gum from under the school tables (Not That bad actually)
  • The Computer i get around 14 fps average is the computer i found on the streets
  • Parents always tell me i'm younger then my actual age to go on rides cheaper
  • Always Refill the $1 Ikea cups unlimited refill >:D
  • Buy School Uniform from K-Mart but without the logo (K-mart = Wall Mart)
